name: Star Commander
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to build a fleet of space ships, explore the galaxy, and wage interstellar war? Of course you have! But even if you haven't, Star Commander is a 4X turn-based strategy game that gives you a chance to do just that.

Planning and tactics, not reflexes and reaction time, are the basic skills needed to play. A successful Star Commander wins by designing powerful Starships, recruiting capable officers, and skillfully maneuvering forces in combat. To the victors go the spoils, while the defeated are doomed to oblivion in the deep black void of space. Can you raise a mighty Starship fleet and conquer the galaxy?
